title: Employee Directory
description: An employee directory built in React that allows both sorting and filtering of employees by name.

title: Clicky
description: Clicky is a fun little memory game built with React with a Rick and Morty theme. Awesome.

title: Emomii
description: A daily mood tracker to identify patterns that can point towards emotionally intelligence.

title: Workout-Tracker
description: Workout tracker allows creation of workout plans of various exercises and charts over time.

title: Readme Generator
description: A Node.js app that accepts input about a github project, and generates a polished readme.

title: Book Search
description: A React.js app that searches Google Books, and saves favorites for future purchase.
